charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1101_0100:
Hearing [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] name called,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] stopped to see
Juliana.
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_0300:
Koraidon and I were just doing a lap around
Pasio.
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_0400: When I saw you, I just had to follow!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_0500:
When I’m riding Koraidon, anywhere I wanna go
is just a hop, skip, and a jump away!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_0600:
That’s how we traveled together in Paldea for so
long. But when we first met...
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_0700:
It was on a beach really close to my house,
right after I set out on my journey!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_0800:
It was pretty weak then, but when I gave it a
sandwich, it perked right up!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_0900:
Apparently it couldn’t use all of its usual powers
at first, because it wasn’t in the best condition.
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_1000:
Now that it’s got its powers back, though, it can
climb cliffs and glide through the air and stuff!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_1100:
If we can see a place, we can get there—
together!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_1500:
Sometimes it even comes begging when it sees
people eating them!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_1600: So I always make sandwiches for it.
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_1700:
But it seems to like Arven’s sandwiches more
than mine!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_1800: So rude! Mine are plenty delicious!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_0401_2000:
Thanks! I’ve tried to get it to where we don’t hold
anything back from each other.
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_0402_2300:
So that’s how we look to you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? I’m happy to
hear that!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_2400:
I hope it feels safe and comfortable when it’s
with me.
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_2500:
And I’d be really happy if it thought of me as
family.
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_2600: Oh! I just had a great idea!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_2700:
Why don’t we invite Nemona and the others to a
picnic sometime?
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_2800: We can all bring whatever sandwiches we want!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_2900: I’ll make one WAY more amazing than Arven’s!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_3000: That’s a promise, Koraidon! You’ll see!
charaepi_ch0287_00_svgirl/2301_1201_3100: This time, MY sandwich will be number one!
